sources.title: Edge Of Isolation | Full Movie | Survival Horror
sources.description:
Edge Of Isolation - Stranded deep in the woods, a young married couple is taken in by an isolationist family, one that lives off the blood and plunder from lost hikers, and they want the couple to stay for the rest of their lives.
2018.  Stars: Michael Marcel, Marem Hassler, Alexandra Peters
